languages.text: "Ахиллеас Скаландр — изменник?! Если этот проклятый мерзавец еще жив, мы выследим его в любой системе! Уж не знаю, есть ли у этого продажного выродка что-то или кто-то, к кому он испытывает любовь, но мы найдем и испепелим это!"

"Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"
languages.original_text: "Ахиллеас Скаландр — изменник?! Если этот проклятый мерзавец еще жив, мы выследим его в любой системе! Уж не знаю, есть ли у этого продажного выродка что-то или кто-то, к кому он испытывает любовь, но мы найдем и испепелим это!"

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander is a turncoat? If that vile wretch is still alive, we'll track him down, whatever system he may be in! And I don't know if there's anything or anyone the degenerate sellout feels love for, but if there is, we'll find and incinerate it!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander is a turncoat? If that vile wretch is still alive, we'll track him down, whatever system he may be in! And I don't know if there's anything or anyone the degenerate sellout feels love for, but if there is, we'll find and incinerate it!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander is a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander is a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: «¿Achilleas Scalander, un traidor? ¡Si ese desgraciado aún vive, le daremos caza sin importar en qué sistema se oculte! ¡No sé si ese chaquetero corrupto es capaz de sentir amor por nada ni nadie, pero si lo hace, lo encontraremos y lo destruiremos!».
languages.original_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Achilleas Scalander es un traidor? ¡Si ese desgraciado aún vive, le daremos caza sin importar en qué sistema se oculte! ¡No sé si ese chaquetero corrupto es capaz de sentir amor por nada ni nadie, pero si lo hace, lo encontraremos y lo destruiremos!».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: “阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德是个叛徒？如果那个该死的混账还活着，就算他躲到天涯海角，我们都会抓到他！我不知道那个混蛋还有没有心，但假如他还有的话，我们一定会把它挖出来！”
languages.original_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"

traits.locale_text: “阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德是个叛徒？如果那个该死的混账还活着，就算他躲到天涯海角，我们都会抓到他！我不知道那个混蛋还有没有心，但如果他还有的话，我们会把它挖出来！”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: « Achilleas Scalander serait... un traître ? Si ce misérable est encore en vie, nous le traquerons et le retrouverons, où qu'il se cache ! J'ignore si une âme corrompue est capable d'aimer quoi ou qui que ce soit, mais si c'est le cas, nous trouverons de quoi il s'agit et nous le détruirons ! »
languages.original_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"

traits.locale_text: « Achilleas Scalander est un traître ? Si ce misérable est encore en vie, nous le traquerons et le retrouverons, où qu'il se cache ! J'ignore si une âme corrompue est capable d'aimer quoi ou qui que ce soit, mais si c'est le cas, nous trouverons de quoi il s'agit et nous le détruirons ! »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: 「アキレアス・スカランダーが裏切り者だと？もし、あの忌々しい野郎がまだ生きているのなら、どこの星系に隠れていようとも、追い詰めてやる！あの堕落した裏切り者が、なにかを大切に思うことがあるのかどうかはわからないが、もしそういうものがあるならぶち壊してやる！」
languages.original_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"

traits.locale_text: 「アキレアス・スカランダーが裏切り者だと？もし、あの忌々しい野郎がまだ生きているのなら、どこの星系に隠れていようとも、追い詰めてやる！あの堕落した裏切り者が、なにかを大切に思うことがあるのかどうかはわからないが、もしそういうものがあるならぶち壊してやる！」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Achilleas Scalander — ein Verräter? Wenn dieser verfluchte Hund noch lebt, jagen und finden wir ihn, in welchem System er sich auch versteckt! Ich weiß nicht, ob dieser korrupte Verräter überhaupt Liebe für irgendetwas oder irgendjemanden empfinden kann, aber wenn, dann finden wir es und vernichten es!"
languages.original_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander ist ein Verräter? Wenn dieser verfluchte Hund noch lebt, jagen und finden wir ihn, in welchem System er sich auch versteckt! Ich weiß nicht, ob dieser korrupte Verräter überhaupt Liebe für irgendetwas oder irgendjemanden empfinden kann, aber wenn, dann finden wir es und vernichten es!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Achilleas Scalander hain miymiş? O lanet pislik hâlâ hayattaysa hangi sistemde olursa olsun onu bulacağız! O yozlaşmış şerefsizin sevdiği bir şey veya birisi var mıdır bilmem ama varsa onu da bulup yok edeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "Achilleas Scalander — a traitor? If that damned wretch is still alive, we'll hunt him down no matter what system he's hiding in! I don't know if that corrupt sellout is capable of feeling love for anything or anyone, but if he does, we'll find it and destroy it!"

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas Scalander hain miymiş? O lanet olasıca pislik hâlâ yaşıyorsa hangi sistemin dibinde olursa olsun onu bulacağız! O yozlaşmış şerefsiz herhangi bir şey veya biri için sevgi hissedebiliyor mu bilmem ama hissediyorsa onu da bulup yok edeceğiz!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster
